maintainer.description: FiSH blowfish encryption module for irssi

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is an encryption plugin for irssi, it is based on blowfish and is fully compatible to original 'blowcrypt' script. It supports private chat and channel encryption. A secure key-exchange system is included as well. Please read the file FiSH-irssi.txt, especially the 'Installation' section, before installing it!
WWW: http://fish.sekure.us/
